settings.title: Welcome to CES 2025
settings.body: Discover cutting-edge e-bike technology and innovative smart riding gear designed to elevate your cycling experience.

settings.title: E-Bike Dealer Opportunities
settings.body: Send us and email at service@vanpowers.com and we'll be in touch shortly!

settings.title: 1. Proven Market Success
settings.desc: Vanpowers was founded in 2022, and we account for 45% of sales among the top 10 e-bike brands on Amazon 200 team members are located throughout North America, Europe and Asia.

settings.title: 2. Advanced R&D and Testing Capabilities
settings.desc: Specialized R&D team in industrial design, structural engineering, and intelligent software/hardware. State-of-the-art lab for comprehensive eBike testing. Rigorous validation ensures safety and reliability.

settings.title: By choosing Vanpowers you will get
3. Competitive Pricing and Lucrative Margins
settings.desc: Low wholesale prices and attractive commission rates maximize your profit margins.

settings.title: 4. Comprehensive Marketing and Sales Support
settings.desc: Full suite of marketing support, including in-store test rides and digital campaigns. Multi-channel promotions: digital ads, influencer partnerships, social media, and PR.

settings.title: 5. Long-Term Warranty and Reliable After-Sales Service
settings.desc: In-store repair compensation up to 52 USD. Free parts replacement and shipping during the warranty period. 6-year frame warranty and 1 year complete bike warranty. Free bike replacement if key components fail during warranty.

settings.title: By choosing Vanpowers you will get
settings.body:
1. Proven Market Success
   Vanpowers was founded in 2022, and we account for 45% of sales among the top 10 eBike brands on Amazon. Our 200 team members are located throughout North America, Europe, and Asia.

2. Advanced R&D and Testing Capabilities
   Specialized R&D team in industrial design, structural engineering, and intelligent software/hardware. State-of-the-art lab for comprehensive eBikes testing. Rigorous validation ensures safety and reliability.

3. Competitive Pricing and Lucrative Margins 
   Low wholesale prices and attractive margins.

4. Comprehensive Marketing and Sales Support
Full suite of marketing support, including in-store test rides and digital campaigns. Multi-channel promotions: digital ads, influencer partnerships, social media, and PR.

5. Long-Term Warranty and Reliable After-Sales Service
 In-store repair compensation up to 52 USD. Free parts replacement and shipping during the warranty 
period. 6-year frame warranty and 1 year complete bike warranty. Free bike replacement if key components fail during warranty.

settings.title: Why Visit Vanpowers at CES?
settings.body:
1、 Be the first to see our latest products and cutting-edge technologies designed to drive business success.

2、Access special deals and partnership opportunities available only at CES. Elevate your business with Vanpowers.

3、Meet our team to discuss how our solutions can power your business growth. Let’s explore synergies and opportunities for collaboration.

4、Experience our bikes firsthand and discover the potential they hold for your business. Plus, enjoy exclusive giveaways tailored for our partners.
